# NIConfiguration

**Class**

An abstract base class for interaction configurations.

## Declaration

```swift
class NIConfiguration
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NIConfiguration] class serves as the common identity for configuration objects. Don’t instantiate this class directly. Instead, instantiate one if its concrete subclasses: [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyPeerConfiguration] or [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NINearbyAccessoryConfiguration]. Use your configuration object to specify the features you want to enable in a Nearby Interaction session, and pass the object to the session’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISession/run(_:)] method.
